Text:
Join me at Facebook if you want to receive more unreleased trance mix albums.

Theres a Trance mix album available at Facebook called: "Friends of Trance [The Facebook Edition]".
Its only available for those who takes the time to join me there.

Enjoy this release!!!!
Thanks... I hope i like 'em, 'cos I'm picky like dat!!!

Hi there Kabalizo and CHD242522, thnx for taking the time to post a little message. I really appreciate it. Its a pitty that so much downloaders dont take the time to say a "thank you" or show in another way their appreciation. But anyway thnx for your comment.

Cheers!!!
